track.strDescriptionEN: "Pump Up the Jam" is the opening track on Technotronic's album Pump Up the Jam: The Album. The song was a worldwide hit, reaching number two on the American Hot 100 in early 1990 and number two in the United Kingdom in 1989. The Belgian studio-based music project was a landmark release for EBM and new beat. It was the first house song, a music-genre originating from Chicago, to break into the mainstream in the US. The song was later certified triple platinum. In 2005, it was remixed by internationally renowned DJ-producer D.O.N.S., who took it to number one on the British Dance Chart.
